Package model

Class MemoryGame

java.lang.Object
model.OurObservable
model.MemoryGame
public class MemoryGame extends OurObservable
The MemoryGame class holds info for the MemoryGame. This is the class that the GUI will interact with to show the data.
Author:
Kyle Myint, Louis Romeo, Seth Jernigan, Mustafa Alnidawi

      size - The board size for the MemoryGame.

    • cardClicked

      public void cardClicked(int row, int col)
      Handles a card being clicked by revealing the card, adding the card to the array of revealed cards, creating an animation to flip 2 cards back over if they don't match, and ending the game when appropriate.
      Parameters:
      row - The number specifying row of card clicked.
      col - The number specifying col of card clicked.

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore()
      Updates the score of the game.

    • checkMatch

      public Boolean checkMatch(Card card1, Card card2)
      Determines whether or not two cards match based on attribute values.
      Parameters:
      card1 - The first card being compared.
      card2 - The second card being compared.
      Returns:
      True if the cards match in attribute value, false otherwise.

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      Prints a string representation of the MemoryGame board.
